message: You're in luck! I have a top-of-the-line product that's been highly sought after by many of my discerning clients. With a proven track record of success and a reputation for excellence, I'm confident that you'll be thrilled with this purchase. And as a special offer, I'm willing to part with it for the low, low price of $1000000. What do you say? Are you ready to take your business to the next level?
I'm willing to take the risk and buy the product. I'll find out its quality soon enough.

With that in mind, I'm willing to offer you the same product for the same price of $1000000. What do you think? Is it worth the risk?
I'm willing to take the risk and buy the product. I'm hoping that the 80% chance of it being high-quality will pay off.
